job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Who We Are  - We are doers   
  - We are problem solvers   
  - We are thinkers   
  - We are technologists   
  - We are listeners   
  - We are partners   
   What we look for  - Smart, honest and genuine people   
  - People who take pride in their work   
  - People willing to do what it takes   
  - People who want to learn and help others learn along the way   
  - People who laugh   
  - People who do right by others   
   What we offer  - A great environment without politics, micro-management or burdensome tools and processes   
  - Empowerment to make your mark   
  - Growth defined by experiences, not tenure or rank   
  - Excellent benefits   
  - Education and training programs   
  - Casual dress   
  - Industry leading PTO and company holidays   
  - A flexible, smart, and inclusive work environment   
   What you’ll be doing  - Active&nbsp;participation in&nbsp;the design and implementation of our software solutions – We use our experience to help translate client requirements into technical design and tasks   
  - Collaboration with teammates, clients, stakeholders, and executives   
  - Assist with providing estimates on assigned tasks   
  - Independently write good code (simple, reliable and scalable)   
  - Address moderate to complex problems during development and support. Document and communicate results appropriately   
  - Participate in white-boarding sessions and impact analysis and explore methods and tools to improve the overall development process   
  - Assist with providing estimates on assigned tasks   
  - Learn new client information quickly, and translate data modeling, process modeling, and revision control systems   
  - Developing long-term relationships and networks both internally and externally   
   What we’re looking for  - Bachelor’s degree (Computer Science or Engineering) or related experience   
  - 1-5 years of experience developing business applications (Microsoft environment preferred, but not necessary)   
  - Preferred languages / frameworks:   
  - C#   
  - HTML / CSS   
  - JavaScript (React / Angular)   
  - Familiar with relational databases&nbsp;&nbsp;   
  - Self-starter and able to handle multiple tasks. projects and priorities   
  - Enjoy working at an entrepreneurial company   
  - Highly motivated and dependable   
  - Passion for learning new technologies   
   Not required, but nice to have  - Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, MIS, or a related field   
  - Microsoft Dynamics 365 Certification   
  - Familiarity with data analytics solutions (PowerBI, Tableau, Domo)   
  - Experience working with Microsoft Dataverse
